title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 5.10 - Redeployment lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 5.10 - Redeployment lists

State Regulations

In instances where an agreement between the State of New York
and an employee organization provides for the establishment of a redeployment
list and/or other benefits as authorized by section
79
of the

Civil Service Law, the provision of said agreement shall be extended to State
employees who are excluded from collective negotiating units. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
5.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
